extendedInfo.description: This is a sample 3 chapters of the novel, Kilt by Love, by Jennifer Conner.âKilt by Love is A Sexy Fun Ride though Scotlandâ Unemployed events planner, Sasha Nolan,  escapes her dismal existence, and splurges on a trip of a lifetime to Scotland. Sheâs determined to discover what Scotsmen wear under their kilts, but instead, sheâs stuck on a tour bus of senior citizens.When she meets Allister MacTavish, a modern day laird, all that changes.  Thereâs one simple rule for her vacation, kilt, conquer and leave. Can Sasha follow her rule when Allister asks for her help in creating a plan to rescue MacTavish Castle from financial ruin? Suddenly Sasha finds that sheâs tempted to abandon her old life, help Allister, and indulge in every sexual fantasy sheâs ever had.Because now, sheâs found out what Scotsmen wear under their kilts.8,400 word sample 1st 3 chapters.This is the first three sample chapters of the novel, Kilt by Love, by Jennifer Conner. If you enjoy this story please visit www.bookstogonow.com , Amazon, Barnes & Noble, or Overdrive to purchase the complete ebook. Kilt by Love is also available in print through Books to Go Now.Coffee Time Romance Review:Hot, Steamy, and Sexy! Kilt by Love is a read that will give you the answer of what exactly a handsome Scotsman wears under his kilt! Great characters and a smooth flowing storyline will give you the excitement you are craving from a good read. reviews.title: A fun and sexy ride through Scotland
